title: Fastest way to crop all images
description: To explore and analyze all the characters in the Kuzushiji Comeptition, you would have to cut out each character. I wanted to save you some time, so I created this notebook and found a pretty fast way to cut out each char. To save you even some more time I saved the computed results of this notebooks in this dataset. If you want to analyze the Kuzushiji Characters, simple use the dataset.
